biotools.summary: SUPERGNOVA (SUPER GeNetic cOVariance Analyzer) is a statistical framework to perform local genetic covariance analysis. SUPERGNOVA only needs GWAS summary data and a reference panel as input data.

bioschemas.name: SUPERGNOVA
bioschemas.summary: SUPERGNOVA (SUPER GeNetic cOVariance Analyzer) is a statistical framework to perform local genetic covariance analysis. SUPERGNOVA only needs GWAS summary data and a reference panel as input data.
